lead_paragraph: SHATKIN--Evelyn, of Bristol, RI, passed away April 2. A graduate of Emerson College, she had a long career as Evelyn Howe, host of Five O'Clock Follies at CBS, Boston, followed by many decades in Public Relations. Survivors include daughters Susan and Joanne Shatkin, sister Janet Dobrer, several nieces and nephews, two grandchildren, one great- grandchild. Predeceased by husband Perry Shatkin, daughter Lenore Richardson Holze, parents Ed and Molly Bergman, brother Walter Bergman. Services today, April 4, Temple Beth El, 70 Orchard St., Providence, RI, 11am. Visiting hours Monday 7-9pm, Tuesday 2-4, 7-9pm. 74 Seabreeze Ln., Bristol, RI. Contributions to Gutterman Religious School Fund, Temple Beth El, or charity of your choice. 1/3
